src_original: yat sarvâryāḥ sarvanavayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisatvā na pariprāpayiṣyanti tad ahaṃ pariprāpayiṣyāmi /
[ Cambridge MS f121a ---> ]  saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyati /  sa vīryabalaparigṛhītenâdhyāśayenâparâvakāśâsvayaṃkārī /
sâivaṃ dṛḍhasaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddho /  yat kiñcit sarvasatvānāṃ pariprāpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati tad ahaṃ pariprāpayiṣyāmi /
